column2: [249] In view of the answer given to the question of law No. 2 in favour of the
Appellant,  I  annul  the  determination  made  by  the  Tax  Appeals  Commission
dated  12.06.2018,  and the Registrar is directed to send a certified copy of this

column1: judgment to the Tax Appeals Commission.

column2: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
